item.title: About
item.description: Me Education I am currently a third-year undergraduate in the physics department of Middle East Technical University. I like mathematics, physics and computer science. So far, my undergraduate research mainly revolve around computational physics. General Interests Below are my current non-academic interests along with when I got into them. Interest Year-Quadrant Programming 2012-? Archery 2015-2 Mountain Biking 2017-2 Classical Guitar 2018-3 Piano 2021-3 Blog Topic I plan to write about all sorts of stuff and in various forms.
